product_name: CliniqueClarifying Face Lotion Toner 1 - Very Dry to Dry
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique’s Clarifying Face Lotion 1 is a mild exfoliating lotion for very dry skin. Dermatologist-developed formula sweeps away dulling flakes.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Very Dry to DrySweeps away pollution, grime, dulling flakes to reveal smoother, clearer-looking skin.Preps skin for moisturizer - exfoliated skin is more receptive to hydration and treatment products.For drier skin types, exfoliation whisks away surface flakes, clearing the way for moisturizer.For oilier skin types, twice-daily exfoliation helps minimize excess oil and keep pores clear.Dermatologist developed and testedAllergy testedFragrance freeHow does Clarifying Lotion fit into your skincare routine? Clarifying Lotion is Step 2 in Clinique's 3-Step skincare system. Cleanse with Facial Soap, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, moisturize with Dramatically Different Moisturizing Lotion+, oil-free Gel, lightweight Jelly, or rich Cream.Clinique Clarifying Lotion is available in 5 skin-typed formulas. Which formula is just right for your skin?Clarifying Lotion 1.0: Extra-gentle, alcohol-free formula is safe for sensitive skin.Clarifying Lotion 1: Mild for very dry skin.Clarifying Lotion 2: Gentle for dry combination skin.Clarifying Lotion 3: Great for combination oily skin.Clarifying Lotion 4: Formulated for oily skin.Did you know Clinique's exfoliating lotion is different from a toner?Toners are primarily used to help rebalance skin after cleansing. Clinique Clarifying Lotion is formulated with exfoliating ingredients to help remove dead cells on skin’s surface. Clearing away that debris with Clarifying Lotion makes skin more receptive to moisturizer and treatment products.Key IngredientsAcetyl glucosamine: Helps balance and smooth skin.Witch hazel: Helps refine skin.BHA (salicylic acid): Helps clear and unclog pores.Research ResultsClinique's Clarifying Lotion face exfoliator instantly delivers clinically proven benefits* for skin that:Looks more radiant.Looks smoother.*Clinical testing on 22 women.Item 2153912How To UseUse twice a day, morning and night.Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.IngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Trehalose, Salicylic Acid, Acetyl Glucosamine, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Tetrahydroxypropyl Ethylenediamine, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Benzophenone-4, Yellow 5 (CI 19140), Blue 1 (CI 42090).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.This brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

media.headline: I will continue to buy this for my facial regime

faceoff_positive.comments: I am obsessed with this toner! Coming from being on accutane for the past eight months, my skin was disgustingly dry and irritable. I also suffer from getting a lot of red bumps and ingrown hairs from shaving my face. (I am a beautiful man BTW) this really helps to smooth out my skin and even calms down my redness. My skin is now fairly normal and on the dry side since coming from accutane but this does not irritate my skin in the slightest and i have super sensitive skin. It makes my skin brighter, pore tighter and give a deeper clean. I'be been using it everyday for the past three weeks and i am in love. There are no more bumps or redness and my pores are smaller! Try it girl it is worth it and it lasts for so long!
faceoff_positive.headline: YAS YAS YAS YASSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS

faceoff_negative.comments: bought the Clinique three step in addition to the exfoliating scrub after I used samples for two weeks. I had high hopes for this product my face felt fabulous I liked the products very much, but on day 15 I came down with contact dermatitis and had to return the whole purchase. I have dry and very very sensitive skin I've never used skin care products on my face ever and I'm 57 years old. In my entire life I've had less than five pimples. In the past I've tried every now and then to adopt a skin care regime but it always ends like this. Because of Clinique' reputation for testing their products I thought this line of skincare would work for me. Despite my problem I would very much recommend this product for a friend because, I think most people can use these products safely
